Name: Infinity Coloring Pixel
About the game: This is the coloring game that the player has to fill the color that matches with the number. Over 1,000 Levels and more UPDATE FOR FREE This is the coloring game. The level has a palette and a canvas. Each color on the palette has a number. The canvas contains pixels and has a number on each pixel. You have to choose a color on the palette and paint each pixel that has the same number. Paint all pixels to finish it. Have fun. Control - Left-click for painting and selecting color - Right-click or middle-click for move around the picture. - Scroll up or down for zoom in, zoom out and scroll color palette.
